{"body": {"name": "NEAR at ETH KL ", "summary": "ETH KL is the first of its kind in the APAC region, setting the stage for groundbreaking developments in the industry. Our mission is to integrate the NEAR blockchain into the vibrant Asia Web3 ecosystem, leveraging the immense talent pool in Asia. We want to make NEAR as a leading Layer 1 blockchain within this dynamic landscape.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": null, "description": "> Event Overview \\\\n\\\\n Name: NEAR at ETH KL \\\\nDate: 4th - 6th of October \\\\nPlace: Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre (KLCC)\\\\n\\\\nETHEREUM KUALA LUMPUR 2024 is an event organized by the ETH KL community, sponsored by the Ethereum Foundation and Etherscan. Malaysia hosts a growing Web3 community with many local developers building on NEAR, Solana, Ethereum, and other platforms. The Malaysian market is ripe for Layer 1 blockchains to recruit more local talent to develop projects on their protocol.\\\\n\\\\nSponsorship deck: (11ETHKL24)\\\\nhttps://acrobat.adobe.com/id/urn%3Aaaid%3Asc%3AAP%3Af01bdfdc-d4ca-4a11-b62e-5d6658fc5498/?x_api_client_id=adobe_com&x_api_client_location=compress_pdf\\\\n\\\\n> Organizing Team\\\\n\\\\n- Yuen: NEAR Malaysia Lead, ex NDC contributor\\\\n- Edward: NEAR Malaysia Lead, Meteor Wallet Founder, Senior developer \\\\n- Aescobar: Paras & Eastblue core team, Jump Defi Core team , Cafe Cartel Core team etc \\\\n- Cudam: NEARWEEK, Ref and Burrow Council member, Dap Dap team member \\\\n- Zennie: Community member in Malaysia \\\\n- Tba\\\\n\\\\n> Speakers for the event for NEAR: \\\\n\\\\n- Edward (Founder of Meteor wallet)\\\\n- Aescobar (Paras core team)\\\\n- Tba\\\\n\\\\n> Event Objectives \\\\n\\\\nGoals \\\\n- Enhancing NEAR blockchain\\\\\\'s presence in Malaysia.\\\\n- Contributing to the growth and expansion of the NEAR ecosystem by attracting new developers and projects to the platform.\\\\n- Networking with Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs), projects, government officials, and CEXes in Malaysia.\\\\n- Engaging investors, students, entrepreneurs, and funding organizations in NEAR to its new AI focus.\\\\n- Getting NEAR into the Malaysia web3 spotlight for expansion and creating a new regional hub\\\\n\\\\n> Malaysia Blockchain Overview\\\\n\\\\n- Eth and Sol have created communities in Malaysia currently ranging from 30 - 50 users per community.\\\\n- Aptos have started to provide university grants for hackathons and events.\\\\n- Manta have started their asia Ambassador program and their main regional hub is in Malaysia. \\\\n- There have been 3 official blockchain clubs in Malaysia which are APBCC, Sunway blockchain Club and Monash blockchain club. UITM has students that have participated in the other blockchain clubs events. There are 2 more universities in talks to create blockchain clubs which are Utar and Tarc university. \\\\n- The security commissions and Malaysia Digital Economy Corporation have pushed more blockchain events and participated in the web3 events made by the different web3 groups in Malaysia.  \\\\n\\\\n\\\\n>  Booth Theme \\\\n\\\\n- Creating a theme for onboarding using the Meteor wallet Harvest moon DAPP\\\\n- Highlight chain abstraction and the NEAR AI focus \\\\n- Working the meme coin in NEAR to see if they want to collaborate and airdrop some tokens to the booth visitors \\\\n- Doing blackdragon theme events \\\\n\\\\n\\\\n> Projects to be Highlighted at the booth besides NEAR \\\\n\\\\n- Meteor wallet \\\\n- Nearweek\\\\n- El Cafe Cartel\\\\n- Lonk\\\\n- Blackdragon\\\\n- Ref finance\\\\n- Burrow\\\\n\\\\n> KPIs and Impact\\\\n\\\\n- 100 users onboarded through Meteor Wallet \\\\n- 100 new followers on Twitter and Telegram for NEAR Malaysia\\\\n- Getting the universities participating in the hackathons (APUBCC, Sunway blockchain Club, Monash Blockchain Club & UITMw\\\\n- Expect 800 attendees and more than 150 hackers \\\\n\\\\n\\\\n> Total Funding Requested:\\\\n\\\\nBudget: $22.5k \\\\nSilver Sponsorship: $15000\\\\nHackathon: $2500\\\\nFlights & accommodation: $4000 \\\\nMerch, Sticker, Banners: $1000\\\\n\\\\n> Contact Information\\\\n\\\\nYuen \\\\nTelegram: https://t.me/Yuensid\\\\nEmail: cyuenlee8@gmail.com\\\\nLinkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chee-yuen-lee-5571b0258/ \\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "9d3e493973259e8d42d44f387c9e96ac20d9cee05bb0795831bbeb227d8a9aa3", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "22500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Event sponsorship"]}

{"data": {"events-committee.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Bounty* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @yuensid.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}NEAR at ETH KL \\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nETH KL is the first of its kind in the APAC region, setting the stage for groundbreaking developments in the industry. Our mission is to integrate the NEAR blockchain into the vibrant Asia Web3 ecosystem, leveraging the immense talent pool in Asia. We want to make NEAR as a leading Layer 1 blockchain within this dynamic landscape.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/events-committee.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=14)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"proposal": {"id": 14, "snapshot": {"name": "NEAR at ETH KL ", "labels": ["Event sponsorship"], "summary": "ETH KL is the first of its kind in the APAC region, setting the stage for groundbreaking developments in the industry. Our mission is to integrate the NEAR blockchain into the vibrant Asia Web3 ecosystem, leveraging the immense talent pool in Asia. We want to make NEAR as a leading Layer 1 blockchain within this dynamic landscape.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "editor_id": "yuensid.near", "timestamp": "1718726136140505817", "supervisor": null, "description": "> Event Overview \\\\n\\\\n Name: NEAR at ETH KL \\\\nDate: 4th - 6th of October \\\\nPlace: Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre (KLCC)\\\\n\\\\nETHEREUM KUALA LUMPUR 2024 is an event organized by the ETH KL community, sponsored by the Ethereum Foundation and Etherscan. Malaysia hosts a growing Web3 community with many local developers building on NEAR, Solana, Ethereum, and other platforms. The Malaysian market is ripe for Layer 1 blockchains to recruit more local talent to develop projects on their protocol.\\\\n\\\\nSponsorship deck: (11ETHKL24)\\\\nhttps://acrobat.adobe.com/id/urn%3Aaaid%3Asc%3AAP%3Af01bdfdc-d4ca-4a11-b62e-5d6658fc5498/?x_api_client_id=adobe_com&x_api_client_location=compress_pdf\\\\n\\\\n> Organizing Team\\\\n\\\\n- Yuen: NEAR Malaysia Lead, ex NDC contributor\\\\n- Edward: NEAR Malaysia Lead, Meteor Wallet Founder, Senior developer \\\\n- Aescobar: Paras & Eastblue core team, Jump Defi Core team , Cafe Cartel Core team etc \\\\n- Cudam: NEARWEEK, Ref and Burrow Council member, Dap Dap team member \\\\n- Zennie: Community member in Malaysia \\\\n- Tba\\\\n\\\\n> Speakers for the event for NEAR: \\\\n\\\\n- Edward (Founder of Meteor wallet)\\\\n- Aescobar (Paras core team)\\\\n- Tba\\\\n\\\\n> Event Objectives \\\\n\\\\nGoals \\\\n- Enhancing NEAR blockchain\\\\\\'s presence in Malaysia.\\\\n- Contributing to the growth and expansion of the NEAR ecosystem by attracting new developers and projects to the platform.\\\\n- Networking with Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs), projects, government officials, and CEXes in Malaysia.\\\\n- Engaging investors, students, entrepreneurs, and funding organizations in NEAR to its new AI focus.\\\\n- Getting NEAR into the Malaysia web3 spotlight for expansion and creating a new regional hub\\\\n\\\\n> Malaysia Blockchain Overview\\\\n\\\\n- Eth and Sol have created communities in Malaysia currently ranging from 30 - 50 users per community.\\\\n- Aptos have started to provide university grants for hackathons and events.\\\\n- Manta have started their asia Ambassador program and their main regional hub is in Malaysia. \\\\n- There have been 3 official blockchain clubs in Malaysia which are APBCC, Sunway blockchain Club and Monash blockchain club. UITM has students that have participated in the other blockchain clubs events. There are 2 more universities in talks to create blockchain clubs which are Utar and Tarc university. \\\\n- The security commissions and Malaysia Digital Economy Corporation have pushed more blockchain events and participated in the web3 events made by the different web3 groups in Malaysia.  \\\\n\\\\n\\\\n>  Booth Theme \\\\n\\\\n- Creating a theme for onboarding using the Meteor wallet Harvest moon DAPP\\\\n- Highlight chain abstraction and the NEAR AI focus \\\\n- Working the meme coin in NEAR to see if they want to collaborate and airdrop some tokens to the booth visitors \\\\n- Doing blackdragon theme events \\\\n\\\\n\\\\n> Projects to be Highlighted at the booth besides NEAR \\\\n\\\\n- Meteor wallet \\\\n- Nearweek\\\\n- El Cafe Cartel\\\\n- Lonk\\\\n- Blackdragon\\\\n- Ref finance\\\\n- Burrow\\\\n\\\\n> KPIs and Impact\\\\n\\\\n- 100 users onboarded through Meteor Wallet \\\\n- 100 new followers on Twitter and Telegram for NEAR Malaysia\\\\n- Getting the universities participating in the hackathons (APUBCC, Sunway blockchain Club, Monash Blockchain Club & UITMw\\\\n- Expect 800 attendees and more than 150 hackers \\\\n\\\\n\\\\n> Total Funding Requested:\\\\n\\\\nBudget: $22.5k \\\\nSilver Sponsorship: $15000\\\\nHackathon: $2500\\\\nFlights & accommodation: $4000 \\\\nMerch, Sticker, Banners: $1000\\\\n\\\\n> Contact Information\\\\n\\\\nYuen \\\\nTelegram: https://t.me/Yuensid\\\\nEmail: cyuenlee8@gmail.com\\\\nLinkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chee-yuen-lee-5571b0258/ \\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "9d3e493973259e8d42d44f387c9e96ac20d9cee05bb0795831bbeb227d8a9aa3", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "22500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "yuensid.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "Proposal - Retroactive Funding for HawkHacks x NEAR Toronto (Powered by Hackbox)", "summary": "We are presenting a retroactive proposal to reimburse the expense overages incurred during the organization of the HawkHacks Hackathon. The event was a massive success featuring 1,289 registrants and 701 attendees, resulting in 148 projects, including 36 focused on the NEAR track.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "## **NEAR Toronto Hackathon Proposal 2 [Hackbox Cohort 1 - Q2 2024] | #PoweredByHackbox** \\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**Requested amount:** $2,678\\\\n\\\\n**Proposal Date:** June 18, 2024\\\\n\\\\n**Proposed by Sal Chaudhry and the NEAR Toronto Team**\\\\n\\\\n### Executive Summary\\\\n\\\\nHawkHacks 2024 was a weekend-long hackathon that aimed to provide an inclusive platform for students and tech enthusiasts to innovate, network, and learn. The event took place at Laurier University in Waterloo, Ontario, from May 17th to May 19th, 2024. The hackathon significantly contributed to the NEAR ecosystem by encouraging the development of innovative blockchain solutions. Participants engaged deeply with NEAR technology, enhancing their skills and contributing to the growth of the NEAR community.\\\\n\\\\nWe are presenting a retroactive proposal to reimburse the expense overages incurred during the organization of the HawkHacks Hackathon. The event was a massive success featuring 1,289 registrants and 701 attendees, we facilitated 148 projects, including 36 focused on the NEAR.\\\\n\\\\n#### Event Stastics\\\\n    Quick Facts\\\\n\\\\n* Registrants: 1,289\\\\n* RSVPs: 814\\\\n* Attendees IRL: 701\\\\n* Total Teams: 190\\\\n* Total Projects: 148\\\\n* Project Submissions: 148\\\\n* NEAR Track Submissions: 36\\\\n* NEAR: TENAMINT x GamingDAO Track Submissions: 20\\\\n* HawkHacks Proof of Participation (Shard Dog) NFT: 168 Claims\\\\n\\\\n### Financial Summary\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n    **Proposed Budget**: $15,000\\\\n\\\\n    **Actual Expenses**: $17,678\\\\n\\\\n    **Overage**: $2,678\\\\n\\\\nThe financial performance for the event reflects an investment that exceeded the proposed budget by $2,859. This overrun was mainly due to increased costs in food and beverages, videography, and logistics, as well as the addition of a pre-hackathon workshop designed to best equip the hackers for success. While there were some savings in printing costs and decreased administrative and staffing expenses, currency exchange and fees also contributed to the additional expenses. Moreover, the delay in receiving funding until the day of the event led to some rush costs. However, these investments were well worth it considering the tremendous success and positive impact of the event. The enhancements in various areas ensured a high-quality experience for all participants, fostering innovation and collaboration in the blockchain community.\\\\n\\\\n**We are seeking financial support for the overages incurred: $2,678**\\\\n\\\\n#### \\\\n    **Expense Breakdown**\\\\n\\\\n* Venue, Partnership, A/V, Marketing, Production:\\\\n    * $7,246\\\\n* Food and Beverage:\\\\n    * $725\\\\n* Pre-Hackathon Workshop: \\\\n    * $467\\\\n* Official Track Prizing: \\\\n    * $5,000\\\\n* Contest/Activity Prizing: \\\\n    * $362\\\\n* Branding, Printing, Giveaways: \\\\n    * $1,014\\\\n* Content Creation: \\\\n    * $1,449\\\\n* Admin & Staffing: \\\\n    * $906\\\\n* Logistics: \\\\n    * $217\\\\n* Misc and Fees: \\\\n    * $290\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**LINKS:**\\\\n\\\\n* Original Proposal: https://near.social/events-committee.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=2\\\\n* Post-Event Report: https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=3306\\\\n* DevHub Hacks (TG) Post: https://t.me/neardevhubhacks/374\\\\n* Highlight Reel: https://x.com/NEAR_Toronto/status/1798123340684841197)\\\\n* Hacker Experience Video: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C72LIEEPDuK/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "toronto-sc.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "2678", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon"]}

{"data": {"events-committee.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Bounty* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @toronto-sc.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}Proposal - Retroactive Funding for HawkHacks x NEAR Toronto (Powered by Hackbox)\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nWe are presenting a retroactive proposal to reimburse the expense overages incurred during the organization of the HawkHacks Hackathon. The event was a massive success featuring 1,289 registrants and 701 attendees, resulting in 148 projects, including 36 focused on the NEAR track.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=15)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"proposal": {"id": 15, "snapshot": {"name": "Proposal - Retroactive Funding for HawkHacks x NEAR Toronto (Powered by Hackbox)", "labels": ["Hackathon"], "summary": "We are presenting a retroactive proposal to reimburse the expense overages incurred during the organization of the HawkHacks Hackathon. The event was a massive success featuring 1,289 registrants and 701 attendees, resulting in 148 projects, including 36 focused on the NEAR track.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "editor_id": "toronto-sc.near", "timestamp": "1718751433286754980", "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "## **NEAR Toronto Hackathon Proposal 2 [Hackbox Cohort 1 - Q2 2024] | #PoweredByHackbox** \\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**Requested amount:** $2,678\\\\n\\\\n**Proposal Date:** June 18, 2024\\\\n\\\\n**Proposed by Sal Chaudhry and the NEAR Toronto Team**\\\\n\\\\n### Executive Summary\\\\n\\\\nHawkHacks 2024 was a weekend-long hackathon that aimed to provide an inclusive platform for students and tech enthusiasts to innovate, network, and learn. The event took place at Laurier University in Waterloo, Ontario, from May 17th to May 19th, 2024. The hackathon significantly contributed to the NEAR ecosystem by encouraging the development of innovative blockchain solutions. Participants engaged deeply with NEAR technology, enhancing their skills and contributing to the growth of the NEAR community.\\\\n\\\\nWe are presenting a retroactive proposal to reimburse the expense overages incurred during the organization of the HawkHacks Hackathon. The event was a massive success featuring 1,289 registrants and 701 attendees, we facilitated 148 projects, including 36 focused on the NEAR.\\\\n\\\\n#### Event Stastics\\\\n    Quick Facts\\\\n\\\\n* Registrants: 1,289\\\\n* RSVPs: 814\\\\n* Attendees IRL: 701\\\\n* Total Teams: 190\\\\n* Total Projects: 148\\\\n* Project Submissions: 148\\\\n* NEAR Track Submissions: 36\\\\n* NEAR: TENAMINT x GamingDAO Track Submissions: 20\\\\n* HawkHacks Proof of Participation (Shard Dog) NFT: 168 Claims\\\\n\\\\n### Financial Summary\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n    **Proposed Budget**: $15,000\\\\n\\\\n    **Actual Expenses**: $17,678\\\\n\\\\n    **Overage**: $2,678\\\\n\\\\nThe financial performance for the event reflects an investment that exceeded the proposed budget by $2,859. This overrun was mainly due to increased costs in food and beverages, videography, and logistics, as well as the addition of a pre-hackathon workshop designed to best equip the hackers for success. While there were some savings in printing costs and decreased administrative and staffing expenses, currency exchange and fees also contributed to the additional expenses. Moreover, the delay in receiving funding until the day of the event led to some rush costs. However, these investments were well worth it considering the tremendous success and positive impact of the event. The enhancements in various areas ensured a high-quality experience for all participants, fostering innovation and collaboration in the blockchain community.\\\\n\\\\n**We are seeking financial support for the overages incurred: $2,678**\\\\n\\\\n#### \\\\n    **Expense Breakdown**\\\\n\\\\n* Venue, Partnership, A/V, Marketing, Production:\\\\n    * $7,246\\\\n* Food and Beverage:\\\\n    * $725\\\\n* Pre-Hackathon Workshop: \\\\n    * $467\\\\n* Official Track Prizing: \\\\n    * $5,000\\\\n* Contest/Activity Prizing: \\\\n    * $362\\\\n* Branding, Printing, Giveaways: \\\\n    * $1,014\\\\n* Content Creation: \\\\n    * $1,449\\\\n* Admin & Staffing: \\\\n    * $906\\\\n* Logistics: \\\\n    * $217\\\\n* Misc and Fees: \\\\n    * $290\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**LINKS:**\\\\n\\\\n* Original Proposal: https://near.social/events-committee.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=2\\\\n* Post-Event Report: https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=post&id=3306\\\\n* DevHub Hacks (TG) Post: https://t.me/neardevhubhacks/374\\\\n* Highlight Reel: https://x.com/NEAR_Toronto/status/1798123340684841197)\\\\n* Hacker Experience Video: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C72LIEEPDuK/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "toronto-sc.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "2678", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "author_id": "toronto-sc.near", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}
